Walking embodiments of curses, misfortune, and the evil eye, aghashes wander the deserts of the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1), searching out the arrogant, charming, and persuasive to humiliate and undermine. Aghashes are often mistaken for some strange form of [hag](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=59), and like those creatures, they're masters at curses. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 19 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 [Aghash](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1118) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 69 **Perception** +12; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10 **Str** +3 **Dex** +4 **Con** +3 **Int** +1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +4 --- **AC** 19 **Fort** +9 **Ref** +10 **Will** +12 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 75 **Immunities** [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38) **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 5, good 5 **Hatred of Beauty** While aghashes hate all mortals, they particularly despise beautiful objects and beautiful or charismatic mortals. When not in physical peril, an aghash is compelled to destroy art and other works of beauty. An aghash can't enter an area of pristine beauty without first marring it in some way. Given a choice, an aghash attacks a foe with the highest Charisma score first. If barred from doing so by force or some magical effect, they take 1d6 mental damage at the end of their turn. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** claw +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 1d6+5 slashing plus 1d6 evil **Divine Innate Spells** DC 21 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) - **1st** [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) (at will) - **2nd** [Touch of Idiocy](/Spells.aspx?ID=341) (at will) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Outcast's Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=211) **Rituals** DC 21 - **1st** [Div Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=46) **Cursed Gaze** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The aghash fixes their gaze on one creature they can see within 20 feet. The creature must attempt a DC 21 Will save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes 2d6 mental damage and becomes [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).
**Failure** The creature takes 4d6 mental damage and becomes either frightened 2 or [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) (the aghash's choice).
**Critical Failure** The creature takes 8d6 mental damage and becomes frightened 2 and stunned 2. **Sandstorm** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The aghash creates a temporary sandstorm in a 30 foot emanation that lasts for 1 minute. Creatures within the emanation take a –4 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and must succeed at a DC 18 Fortitude save. On a failure, they're forced to hold their breath or else they start [suffocating](/Rules.aspx?ID=468). A creature within the sandstorm at the end of its turn takes 1d6 slashing damage. [Divs](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=225) are immune to all effects of an aghash's sandstorm.
name: Aghash
